reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits true to size and appreciate its quality, with one noting it maintains good condition after multiple washesings.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, comfy, easy!
items.body: Beautiful color, comfortable, soft to the touch, very nice and slightly roomy fit. I would prefer for the fabric content to be more natural as I'm trying to move away from any artificial fibers. Read more
items.author: Ange

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fall sweater
items.body: True to size! Great fabric nice and smooth feeling, has held up great in the wash. The color is perfect for fall! Not to heavy but will still keep you warm! Read more
items.author: Cary Schroeder

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater - not true red
items.body: This is a nice sweater but it is not “red”. It is strawberry (pinkish red). I was looking for a true bright red sweater to wear to UNLV games. The fit is great. I ordered a medium. I am 5’4” and 165 pounds.. Read more
items.author: Anthony

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater!
items.body: Absolutely love this! This chocolate brown color is everything nd perfect for fall! It fits true to size. It’s soft and not too thick, not too thin. Perfect. Good value for the money. Read more
items.author: JOHN K BURNS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfy!!
items.body: This is such a soft and comfy sweater!! Love that it fits a little large! Super cute with a tank underneath it!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater!
items.body: Very nice sweater. It’s very comfortable and the material isn’t flimsy, it’s on the thicker side. It has a sheer feel. The color is as pictured. I received many compliments on it. It can be dressed up or down. The sleeves are different than other sweaters and sets this apart. I didn’t know if I’d like the sleeves, but I was pleasantly surprised. Definitely a staple sweater for the fall/winter. Read more
items.author: KLV

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and comfy side
items.body: The sweater is a nice and thick quality. The elasticity also seems to last well so far and hasn’t gotten all loose as I’ve continued to wear it so far. It’s also very soft on the inside so it’s very comfortable to wear with or without a shirt underneath. Accurate sizing. Read more
items.author: Anom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fall Sweater
items.body: Love these sweaters! Perfect fit, soft and cozy, I bought three so far. Sized to fit but go up if you want a baggy oversized look. Read more
items.author: Shannon Martin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Gray, Rust, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Cashmere, Coffee, Orange, Polka Dot, Red, Navy, Almond. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
